account.title: Your Account
account.subtitle: Manage your security deposit and track performance

deposit.title: Deposit ckUSDC Security
deposit.instructions: To deposit ckUSDC, you need to send it to the orderbook canister using your unique subaccount identifier. Use the NNS dapp or compatible ICRC-1 wallet to send funds to the account details below.
deposit.sendFromWallet: Send ckUSDC from any wallet to this address, then click Refresh in the balance section.
deposit.metanetWalletInstantly: Use your connected Metanet wallet to deposit instantly
deposit.amountHelper: Enter the amount you sent from your wallet

withdraw.title: Withdraw ckUSDC
withdraw.securityProtected: Withdraw your available balance. Security deposits for incomplete trades are protected and cannot be withdrawn.
withdraw.amountHelper: Enter amount to withdraw to your wallet
withdraw.addressHelper: Your ICP principal or account identifier

trade.txHexHelper: If you already sent the BSV, paste the transaction hex here
trade.expiredWarning: ⚠️ Expired! Penalty will be applied automatically. Submission no longer allowed.
trade.expiredMessage: The locked chunks have been returned to the orderbook. This trade cannot be completed.
trade.paymentSubmittedMessage: Your BSV payment is being confirmed. Once confirmed after {{confirmDepth}} blocks, you can claim your USDC plus {{bonus}}% bonus.
trade.manualClaimDesc: For transactions not indexed by Metanet platform
trade.bumpHexHelper: Paste BUMP proof hex for SPV verification
trade.manualHexReady: ✓ Manual hex values will be used for claim
trade.withdrawalStuckMessage: Your withdrawal is stuck in pending state. This usually happens when a claim attempt failed. Click the button below to reset and try again.
trade.manualTxDescription: Paste your signed transaction hex below. It will be broadcast to the BSV network and then submitted to the orderbook canister.
trade.resubmitDescription: You can resubmit a new transaction within {{resubmitWindow}} hours of initial submission. Resubmission costs {{penalty}}% of trade value (from your security deposit) and resets the claim timer by {{releaseWait}} hours. The {{claimExpiry}}-hour expiry does NOT extend - you still have {{claimExpiry}} hours total to claim. This prevents gaming during market volatility while allowing genuine mistake corrections.
trade.resubmitDesc: Need to fix a mistake? Costs {{penalty}}% penalty + claim timer resets to {{releaseWait}}h. Still {{claimExpiry}}h total to claim (within first {{resubmitWindow}}h only).
trade.resubmitExactInstructions: Important: when resubmitting, send a single transaction that contains all outputs in the exact order listed above, with the exact sats amounts for each address. Do not split into multiple transactions or change the order.

trades.noTrades: No trades yet. Create your first trade to start earning!
trades.subtitle: Active trades requiring action only

pastTrades.title: All Trades
pastTrades.subtitle: Complete trade history - open and closed trades

errors.txOrBumpNotFound: Transaction or BUMP proof not found. Use manual claim form to paste hex values.
errors.noTransactionFound: No transaction found for this trade
errors.walletTimeout: Wallet request timed out. Please try again.

messages.tradeResetSuccess: Trade reset successfully! You can now retry claiming.

createTrade.title: Create Trade
createTrade.disclaimerLink: Read disclaimers before placing a trade
createTrade.amountMultiple: Amount must be a multiple of {{amount}} USDC
createTrade.unableToFetchPrice: Unable to fetch BSV price. Please try again.
createTrade.partialOrderInfo: Only {{available}} USDC available in orderbook. Your trade will be partially filled.
createTrade.noTradesCreated: No trades created. No matching chunks available.
createTrade.singleTradeCreated: ✨ Trade created! You can now send BSV to the provided address.
createTrade.multipleTradesCreated: ✨ {{count}} trades created! You can now send BSV to the provided addresses.
createTrade.createFailed: Failed to create trades. Please try again.
createTrade.step2Penalty: Penalty: {{percent}}% security deposit if you fail to deliver
